name: SkyfaLL (itch) (Captain Perriwhelk)
description: SkyfaLL is a open world top down survival game that takes place in the futuristic city of Skygate. SkyGate had a space elevator and was a bustling city full of cybernetics and corrupt politicians. Then all electricity stopped working, Not even a simple flashlight works anymore. On top of that there is now a blood red aroura in the sky, as well as escaped zoo animals in the elevated and lower streets. The only objective is to survive and find stories of other survivors. Will you be able to survive in the once great city of skygate? Or will you be like the thousands who perished?
